Title: Viral Classroom Video Claiming ‘Islamic Indoctrination’ found to be Fake
Claim: A video is circulating online with the allegation that “young white children are being indoctrinated into Islam” and shown “raising their hands and chanting ‘Allahu Akbar’ in a classroom.”

Title: Did Indian and Pakistani cricket players start brawls during a match in Sharjah?
